data_meta.titleEn: Taking a Taxi to the National Park
data_meta.titleKo: Taking a Taxi to the National Park

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: Excuse me, could you take me to the national park?

sentences.speaker: Laura
sentences.sentence: Sure, hop in. It's quite a drive, though.

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: How long will it take to get there?

sentences.speaker: Laura
sentences.sentence: Around an hour, depending on the traffic.

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: Thank you. I'm really looking forward to seeing the park.

expressions.desc: 대화에서 Laura는 '타다'라는 표현을 사용하여 Robert에게 택시에 타라고 초대합니다.
expressions.example_en: The car is ready. Hop in, and we will go.
expressions.example_ko: 차가 준비되었습니다. 타세요, 그러면 우리가 갈게요.

sentences.sentence: 교통 상황에 따라서지만, 대략 한 시간 정도입니다.
감사합니다. 공원을 보는 것이 정말 기대되네요.
